problem.markdown: 1. The velocity profile for turbulent flow look like ( ) O-Shape (x) I-Shape ( ) C-Sahpe ( ) D-Shape 2. Method Factor is equal to (x) Vavg/Vc ( ) Vc/Vmin ( ) Vmin/Vc ( ) Vc/Vavg 3. The central velocity is measured with the help of (x) Pitot Tube ( ) Kata Thermometer ( ) Fortin Barometer ( ) Anemometer 4. The average velocity is measured with the help of ( ) Assaman Psychrometer (x) Pitot Tube ( ) Kata Thermometer ( ) Anemometer 5. The method factor of any duct is 0.85, if central velocity of the duct is measured as 1.2 m/sec. What is the value of average velocity of air flowing through the duct? ( ) 1.2 m/sec (x) 2.01 m/sec ( ) 0.85 m/sec ( ) 1.02 m/sec
